A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was so excited for this movie and I really love the Star Wars story from the movies to the tv shows to the comic books. This movie was a big disappointment and just weird at times. Disney has huge responsibility taking on this franchise and for the most part they have done it well I think but they did not live up to expectations on this one. Very let down. To all the people who rated it highly\, I am glad you enjoyed it (I desperately wanted to myself)\, but stop trying to discount and explain away the many reviewers who were disappointed they are not bots.
